text: Abduallah Hussein Alkorshomi () was the Prime Minister of the Yemen Arab Republic from 2 September 1969 until 5 February 1970. He served under President Abdul Rahman al-Iryani. He was born in 1932 in the village of Bayt Baws in Bani Matar District in Sanaa Governorate. He died July 26, 2007, and was buried in the Bayt Baws Graveyard. == References == * "Former prime minister and roads guru mourned", by Zaid al-Alayaâ€™a, Jul 31, 2007, Yemen Observer. Retrieved April 15, 2010. Category:Prime Ministers of North Yemen Category:1932 births Category:2007 deaths
title: Abdullah Kurshumi
